titleStmt.title: To the King's Most Excellent Majesty, the humble address of the Lord Mayor, aldermen and sheriffs of the city and liberties of Dublin, in behalf of themselves and others, the Protestant freemen and inhabitants thereof
titleStmt.author: Dublin (Ireland). Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Dublin, printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Took, printer to the King and Queens Most Excellent Majesties and re-printed by him at London, and sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

person.persName: Queens Most Excellent Majesties and re-printed
